Generated Narrative: SearchParameter condition-lastUpdated

ConditionLastUpdatedSearchParameter

Parameter _lastUpdated:date

Searches for condition based on service lastUpdated field eg) /openmrs/ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?_lastUpdated={date}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: ConditionLastUpdatedSearchParameter
description: Searches for condition based on service lastUpdated field eg) /openmrs/ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?_lastUpdated={date}
